item.title: Bangalore to Munnar Solo Trip Plan
item.description: Solo trip from Bangalore to Munnar can be a delightful experience, as you'll get to explore the picturesque tea plantations, misty hills, and serene lakes of this charming hill station in Kerala. Here's a suggested itinerary for your journey, Route Bangalore -> Salem -> Dindigul -> Munnar -> Salem -> Bangalore Day 1: Bangalore to Munnar Start your trip early i
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
